title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
and see if there are any survivors. Help Gauntlet Yeva push the doors to get through the wreckage into the burning building. If you do this successfully, you can search the area for survivors.

Search for Grand Duke Ravengard.

As you enter the burning inn, you should be able to encounter and save Counsellor Florrick. She's trapped beyond a broken door at Waukeen's rest, The Risen Road. You'll find Counsellor Florrick in one of the rooms upstairs. This will update the journal for: Rescue the Gra
